title: Gold Medalist at National Hackathon
description: A National level Hackathon “ Deltathon” organised by Purbanchal University. This was a 24 hour hackathon with 30+ teams competing against each other. This was also my first physical hackathon with great experience. I won the title of 'National Hackathon'

title: Winner at Clash of Code
description: A competition organised by Kathmandu Model College Computer Club. I got a great chance to represent my school in this event and I got a winning trophy along with a certificate

title: President of the year
description: I was awarded with president of the year for a great contribution to a club and also got a club Citations from Rotary International during my tenure.

title: Bronze Medal at Province Level Web development Competition
description: This was a province level competition organised by Computer Association of Nepal -CAN. There were around 30 individuals competing for the title in 5 hours of coding. Then a presentation session demonstrating our project. I got bronze medal there during my freshman year in highschool that was also a good initial achievement that encouraged me to do more in the coming days.

title: Winner at Web Design
description: A competition organised by Kathmandu Model College Computer Club and I won the competition.I got a great chance to represent my school in this event. .

title: Best Community Impact Project
description: This was awarded by Butwal Sub-Metropolitan City for a project “Ragat Nepal” (Blood Nepal). Butwal Sub-Metropolitan City also collaborated with us in the project supporting us.

title: Hero of the Conference
description: I was awarded the title of “Hero of the Conference” at the 10th Interact District Conference organised by Interact District 3292 Nepal & Bhutan. This event was supported by Rotary District 3292 Nepal & Bhutan, in presence of Rtn. Rajendra Dhoju - District Governor.

title: Most Innovative Project
description: This was awarded by Tilottama Municipality for a project “Ragat Nepal” (Blood Nepal). Tilottama Municipality also collaborated with us in the project supporting us.

title: Young Social Activities
description: I was awarded as Young Social Activities from the former minister of health and environment. This was a 50 week cleaning camp “ Butwal Tinau Cleaning Champaign”

title: District Level Science and Technology Fair
description: I won these competitions for 3 years during my high school. We showcased our Robotic Cleaner, Ragat Nepal ( Blood Nepal ),  Study AI-Web in these events. Luckily my team won this for 3 continuous years.
